entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix the SDK repo to stop using its own version of Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions in the dotnet app #84860
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Assertion failure -- condition 'aname != NULL' not met #84859
  • Symbols missing for crossgen2 after AOT #84857
    8.0.0
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger: use LastIndexOfAnyExcept (when relevant) #84855
  • [API Proposal]: OnBeforeBuild Delegate - Add a hook into the ServiceCollection, allowing execution of code just before building the ServiceProvider #84847
  • [API Proposal]: SequenceCompareTo accepting a custom comparer #84838
  • Plugin method is ignored without exception if method signature changed #84836
  • CoreCLR RISC-V architecture port #84834
  • The ConvertName function in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy doesn't handle null value #84830
  • Unsupported LdapConnection.SessionOptions throws LdapException with Message "The LDAP server is unavailable" on Linux #84825
  • CookieContainer doesn't replace Cookie with same name #84820
    Future
  • Intermittent failure in JIT/Directed/coverage/oldtests/tlstest_il_r/tlstest.dll #84818
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\unittests\\EHPatternTests\\EHPatternTests.cmd #84815
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #84813

Closed

  • jitrolling build is broken #84822
    8.0.0
  • jitformat failing on linux x64 #84780
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR native build on Linux / Linux_musl arm64 / arm causes clang crashes #84802
  • Unable to compile mono arm64 with clang12 #84503
  • Regressions in System.Reflection.Invoke #84789
  • Assertion failed 'likelihood >= 0.0' during 'Profile incorporation' #84798
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient parallel requests hang on macOS #82634
    Future
  • [Test issue] #84850
  • [CI Build][Mono][NativeAOT] Cannot convert from 'System.Span<byte>' to 'System.Span<char>' #84845
  • Tons of double writes because of intellisense xml docs binplacing #84762
    8.0.0
  • Include ADO azure-feed:// URI for daily build feeds in dogfooding docs #84699
    8.0.0
  • Use primitive type IUtf8SpanFormattable implementations #84527
  • Add Unsafe.As() non-ref overload #13815
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadWrite_Random_Success #84816
  • Why is the performance of HttpClient low? #84672
  • [API Proposal]: Make RegexRunner.CharInClass public instead of protected #84783
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen #84462
  • Official build failure trying to sign Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack #84742
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix nativeaot libraries test cross-build #84870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix stepping by removing the unnecessary logic in VirtualCallStubManagerManager #84869
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disallow `BLK<SIMD>` #84868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • [wasm] New instruction value model for jiterpreter #84866
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Reduce regex test suite time #84865
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file and native AOT dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix for x86 stublinker handling of optimized GC descs #84861
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Tar: Add missing TarFile.CreateFromDirectoryAsync roundtrip tests #84856
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • Use AVX-512 in LowerCallMemcmp #84854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Deduplicate Parallel.For code with generic math #84853
    area-System.Threading
  • Use ubuntu 22.04 for gcc build #84852
    needs-area-label
  • [ios][wasm] Bump to ICU-72 #84849
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Publish Aggregated Values For `Counter` and `UpDownCounter` For System.Diagnostics.Metrics #84846
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Fix OperatingSystemTest.TestIsOSPlatform_MacCatalyst #84842
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Narrow,Widen as intrinsics on arm64. #84837
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve docs for the linker analyzer tool #84833
    documentation, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix JitDisasmWithAlignmentBoundaries #84827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • restore the upper vector at the use of GT_FIELD_LIST #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make `MethodTable` base size access more "typed" #84823
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Adjust managed type system for new function pointer handling #84819
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Obsolete some protected, unused members of Regex{Runner} #84812
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #84432
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.18
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #84641
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.7
  • Bump mariner versions #84863
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix LoadXsltTransforms and LoadAllTransforms tests in S.S.Cryptography.Xml on iOS/tvOS #84832
    area-System.Security
  • Reduce size of RegexNode by 8 bytes #84843
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Fix MacCatalyst .framework build #84858
    needs-area-label
  • Disable component governance for internal JIT pipelines #84683
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete misleading comment #84848
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Update mariner image versions #84851
    needs-area-label
  • Add public UTF8 TryFormat overloads to relevant types #84841
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • JIT: fix exit edge likelihood computation for capped loops #84817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Opt-out of default target framework filtering in source-build infra #84811
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Tar: Add missing TarFile.CreateFromDirectoryAsync roundtrip tests #84303
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [mono][interp] Update ref count for local var defs during optimization #84840
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix double writes for M.Extensions xml docs #84839
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update container for building rpms to be based on mariner #84809
    area-Setup
  • [mono][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with miniJIT #84345
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Include Include ADO azure-feed:// URI in dogfooding docs #84844
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` initialized performance tests #84829
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on all the numeric types in corelib #84587
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • SPMI: Write enabled JIT options in markdown summary #84826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix indirection for RunInitializers when target does not support relative pointers #84778
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Report contents of chained resolvers in exception messages. #84757
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84761
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use RegexRunner.CharInClass directly from source-generated regex code #84814
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avoid clearing mark array when it was not committed #84734
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix x64 macOS and Linux managed debugging #84655
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Generate SslConnectionInfo.Unix.cs with T4 template #84690
    area-System.Net.Security, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Simplify some importer code #84656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Eliminate bound checks for "arr[index % arr.Length]" #84231
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Release/7.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 7.0 #84679
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.7
  • [Release/6.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 6.0 #84680
    Servicing-approved, breaking-change, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 6.0.18
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] ARM32/ARM64 - Fixed zero/sign-extension for `GT_STORE_LCL_VAR` in codegen #84716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set better DfsBlockEntry stack initial capacity #84186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize GDV checks for objects with known type #84661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Guid #84553
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Complex #84779
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 6.0 #84681
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.18
  • Deduplicate Binary Integer parsing logic #84582
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics
  • [browser] Minimal blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-GC-coreclr
  • Implementing GetElement, ToScalar, and WithElement for Vector512 #84791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement locale native functions #84417
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Fix enterprise linux build #84795
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #84604
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasm] Turn Wasm exception handling on by default and use WasmEnableExceptio… #84573
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve SequenceEqual for constant lengths unrolling #84524
    area-System.Memory
  • Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #84735
    area-Interop-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable 2 failing tests for 6.0 #84726
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix a number of issues related to boxed value serialization #84768
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use net6.0 SqlClient TFM under source-build #84782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add HttpClient.Shared #84327
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Dot as intrinsic for arm64. #84245
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Don't re-instrument methods which don't need that #84772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • NO REVIEW - Test perf without AndNot #84773
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle not compatible parameters to IndexOf #84692
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running console app from CLI using `dotnet run` is slow #31815

Closed

  • [Linux-only] aspnetcore publish can produce 2 web.configs #14853

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove usages of CentOS 7 #31814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CSS parser version #31809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31808
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent restore loop in VS #31798
    Area-External, untriaged

Merged

  • Respond to ProduceReferenceAssembly default changing to true #31598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #31787
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bundle Source Link packages #31632
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault property #31626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Split blazor boot extension target for build and publish #31781
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Add IsAotCompatible flag to enable all analyzers and IsTrimmable #31766
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Fix incorrect sln add generation #11846
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Plan for "Inline Arrays" feature #67826
  • Raw multiline string literal doesn't show indentation line if closing """ isn't in viewport #67821
    Backlog
  • Very small subset of violations\rules are reported by roslyn after migration from *.ruleset files to GlobalAnalyzerConfigFiles and rditorconfig type files #67820
  • NRE in NullableWalker while editing code #67816

Closed

  • Generic Attribute not possible when passing on generic type #67569
    17.7
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33613.491 #67814

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for parameter-less LSP requests #67829
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache the names of assembly symbols for PEReferences #67828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move to non-segmented dictionary #67825
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not allocate Location[]s for source methods #67823
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use proper type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Semantic snippets: Add inline statement snippets #67819
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to TemporaryArrays while topologically sorting graphs #67780
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add "Inline Arrays" feature to "Language Feature Status.md" #67827
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Include matched spans in our 'container' pattern matcher #67813
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer creation of Location objects to the point they are actually needed. #67742
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix server crash if inlay hint entry not in cache #67810
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Correct generate rename code action in LSP #67731
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid allocating delegates when formatting trees. #67812
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations of StateForCase instances. #67778
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67762
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Have AsyncLazy always cache values #67207
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community
  • WIP: Not for review - Merged branch of all perf work. #67730
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references (#6… #67808
    Area-Compilers, Regression, untriaged
  • Consider ref property and indexer accesses to have home #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid realizing locations array when finding the symbol found in a particular location. #67691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool 'boxed' helper objects used during constraints checking #67724
    Area-Compilers
  • New contracts #67811
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • More source build work #67809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Update `nameof` feature status #67794
    Area-Compilers, Documentation

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for binding to MarkupString values #47718
  • Perf regression: endpoint #47715
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mapaction #47714
  • Tab delays on content update #47713
  • HubConnection StartAsync in hosted PWA Blazor Webassembly takes too long in chromium based browsers #47709
  • Avoid CA2201 (Generic Exception) Violations #47708
  • Support all error's status codes ProblemDetail types for generating swagger docs in MinimalApi #47705
  • Support POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ in EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider.cs #47704
  • > I have seen no indications of this being addressed: There should be an automatic, native and super efficient way of making function calls between the client and the server. #47703
  • Failed to establish TLS connection to grpc streaming service #47702
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, plaintext #47701
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, single_query #47700
  • Any update on when the Authorization Server enhancements will ship? #47699
  • Async resource filter AfterOnResourceExecution diagnostic event only emitted on short-circuit #47698

Closed

  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Multiple Authorize Attributes in MinAPI generates "AuthenticationScheme: Bearer was forbidden." #47581
  • Styling Identity Razor Pages to use default Blazor theme is very difficult with available documentation #45174
    Discussions
  • Blazor static file url is incorrect when Blazor is running in a virtual app #47627
  • Move asset compression to the Static Web Assets SDK from the Blazor Webassembly SDK #46998
    8.0-preview4
  • Google oauth2 An error was encountered while handling the remote login. #47689
  • Blazor still routing to the wrong request endpoint #47710
  • Performance degradation in PersistingComponentStateSubscription #47669
  • Quarantine IHttpActivityFeatureIsAssignedToIfItExists #38736
    Test failures
  • Annotate top-level methods that aren't native AOT friendly as such so that analyzers produce warnings at design time #47521
    8.0-preview4
  • Reduce the size cost of unused protocol support #46681
    8.0-preview4
  • Introduce trim-friendly APIs for controlling HTTPS Configuration support #47567
  • Local build for v6.0.14 on Oracle Linux 9 is failing on Yarn #46821
  • Combined use of @bind-Value:set, @bind-Value:get @bind-Value:event does not work #47661

PullRequests

Created

  • Add AOT flag to worker template #47721
    area-mvc
  • Update the Worker template to use `Host.CreateApplicationBuilder` #47720
    area-mvc
  • Add support for binding to MarkupString values #47719
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, blog-candidate, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • [Blazor] Adds support for server side rendered forms (without a body) #47716
    area-blazor
  • Fix F# starter web template. #47697
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Sync shared code from runtime #47684
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Remove dependencies that exist in base image #47696
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Update CSS parser commit #47712
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `fed4822` to `3c41fe2` #47706
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `057b4e9` to `12a5852` #47707
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview4
  • Diaganostics and metrics clean up #47679
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Update README.md #47641
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Update SDK #47540
    area-signalr
  • Add support for logging/throwing exceptions in RDG #47657
    area-runtime
  • Log if a server certificate lacks the subjectAlternativeName extensions #47678
    area-runtime
  • Log if request reaches the end of request pipeline #47681
    area-runtime
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • !eeheap is reporting slightly inaccurate committed bytes. #3482
    8.0.0
  • Post-Mortem Native and Managed Heap Diagnostics Improvements #3736
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

Updated

  • Fix incorrect rendering of counters #3816
    dotnet-counters, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improving Navigation Speed and Performance #14591
  • Enable using Safari dev tools with BlazorWebView #14590
  • Month name is shown by computer region option not by computer language #14589
  • label created dynamicaly in code doesn't strech like it should #14588
  • ImageButton with FontImageSource becomes invisible on ContentPage (but can still be clicked) if you move away from the tab and come back to the tab #14587
  • RefreshView issue #14585
  • Can't find Apple SDK Location despite correct SDK path #14582
  • GradialRadientBrush not working as expected on Android #14581

    Backlog
  • [Android] Cannot update the Entry Background once established #12212
    Backlog
  • Android系统下RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform无法正常使用.与Xamarin不一致 #14579

PullRequests

Created

Merged

    area/tooling ⚙️, backport/suggested

  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteUpdate returns error when updating entity contains owned type #30696
  • Is it possible to map nested properties? #30692
  • Extremely large memory consumption in "ToListAsync()" when using cancellation token #30691
  • Add/Rename/Delete/Data Type Changes of Column Should Auto Be Modified In Database Table By EF Core #30690
  • SetCommandTimeout seems like it is not working #30688
  • why the collection type is List instead of HashSet #30687

Closed

  • Unneeded subquery and projection when using ordering without limit/offset in set operations #30684
  • EF Core 7 incorrectly detects circular dependency #30689
  • GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #29638
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Stop pushing down to subquery for non-Concat set operations without limit/offset #30685
  • [release/7.0] Build on 2004 rather than 2204 #30694
  • [release/6.0] Build on 2004 rather than 2204 #30693
  • Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #30617
  • Fix to #30326 - Query: converter from bool used in predicate without comparison fails on sqlite (and other non-sql server backends?) #30666

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30664
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
